author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Metals Investors Had Nowhere to Hide in Volatility Surge
text: Volatility in the aluminum market from geopolitical uncertainty is roiling investors who hedge their positions to lock in prices–a development that could cause more turbulence. Prices swung wildly after the U.S. sanctioned Russian aluminum giant , the world’s second-largest supplier.
